display_name: Non-supine Childhood Adenotonsillectomy Trial (CHAT) Apnea-Hypopnea Index (AHI) (obstructive apneas all desaturations, mixed apneas all desaturations, plus hypopneas with >=3% or arousal)
description: {[(total number of obstructive apneas) + (total number of mixed apneas) + (total number of hypopneas associated with >= 3% desaturation or arousal)] / (hours of sleep)}. will be missing if Total Sleep Time (TST) is 0.
calculation: 60*(oarop + oanop + marop + manrop + hroa3 + hnroa3) / slpprdp
